questions.question: Which country's franc was the official currency of the Principality of Lucca and Piombino?

How might the use of the French franc have influenced trade and economic relations within the Principality of Lucca and Piombino?
What other factors might have contributed to the choice of the French franc as the official currency?
Why might a principality choose to use a different country's currency?
Can you name other historical examples of principalities using a foreign currency?

What are some of the potential benefits and drawbacks of using a foreign currency?
